name: Solana & Anchor Development
postCreateCommand: sh -c "$(curl -sSfL https://release.solana.com/stable/install)" && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/share/solana/install/active_release/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc && cargo install --git https://github.com/coral-xyz/anchor avm --locked && ~/.cargo/bin/avm install latest && ~/.cargo/bin/avm use latest
